title: 1 file scanned
body:
hello,

 i have been facing this problem today where i have difficulties updating to patch 6.21


when i tried downloading the new patch today i faced this weird problem in league of legends  where it just stays on 1 file scanned but then this pop up appears which says "unspecified error occurred. please check the logs for more information", i tried relaunching the game and i tried to "Repair" it. but nothing seemed to do any good. i dont know if i should uninstall it then install it, i hope someone can help find a solution for this technical issue.

thanks for your time :)

replies.body:
Are you live in oman ?? because what i heard that some of omani player can't play LOL for unknown reason.

try to call to your telecom company

It seems that your patcher is trying to scan your game files to prepare for an update, but is being blocked by either a setting or software.  Go over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help restore access to the patcher and get updated.  Hope that helps!
